column2: T.  Deekiriwewa with L.M.  Deekiriwewa, Dr.  M .K.  Herath and  Dr. K.  De Silva  for the Petitioner
Dr. Charuka  Ekanayaka SC for the 1st to 10th  and  12th  Respondents
The  Petitioner  is  a  public  officer  who  was  entitled  to  import  a  motor  vehicle  with  a  specific
concessionary  rate  under  the  Trade,  Tariff and  Investment  Policy  circular  no. 01/2010  and  its
maximum value  limit of any vehicle which can  be  imported was  US$  35,000.
